true: You hear a short beep. The door unlocks itself!

column6: Any idea who the attackers are yet?
As far as I know, there was no forewarning, no attempt at negotiations...
Those bastards... Just wait until I get back in my Saber!
We've got to stay calm and listen to the lieutenant!
Hi, I'm the mechanic. Nice to meet ya'.
I can upgrade your ship and weapons, for a price.
No credits, no service. And no refunds.
Brave defenders of the planet... That's what they call us pilots.
Are we worthy of such praise?
There's been talk about a counterattack.
If you ask me, that's a bit premature.
Oh by the way: the code to the locker room is 2258.
